# Metmask: Token Addresses

At the bottom of Metmask select **Add Token**:

![](data:image/png;base64,)

Fill in the **Token Contract Address** and the rest of the fields should fill in automatically:

![](https://testnet.anthillhq.com/static/media/MetamaskAddTokenAddress.6f24c3ac.png)

The token addresses for this deployment are:

* **ANT Token:**0xDf1947bB956EF2713A3A7D3D1e4560Dc593A4Ac1
* **ANT Share:**0xd62Df81361922324a69527E5858F56856E42e914
* **ANT Bond:**0x8132ce880Ad1A861214fA57a37D9432406140dC7
* **BUSD Token:**0xB926105A3736822C5B030C3A6db504a5833dBf80

Select **Next** and finally select **Add Tokens**:

![](https://testnet.anthillhq.com/static/media/MetamaskAddTokenConfirmation.37e40a7b.png)

The Token is added now and you should see the balance in your wallet.
